title: Decorative Composition with Standing Female in Landscape with Fountains
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on heavy, textured white board
description: Fountain at center in blue pool of still wather.  To the right of this, statue of towering, faceless female form standing above a purple rippling pond that has a pink geyser of sorts shooting from its edge.  In the foreground, yet another pool shooting up in interwining, twisting stream of colors that disperse in two directions into black sky.
name: Drawing
